Parameter.description: name of the school. This field is required. Maximum length of the name is 100
address of the school. Maximum length of the address is 1000

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
    "_id":"5fe5e6bac89605315223d944",
    "name":"Sandalwood Middle School",
    "address":"542 Bald Hill Ave Riverview, FL 33569",
    "noOfStudents":312,
    "createdAt":"2020-12-25T13:18:50.547Z",
    "updatedAt":"2020-12-25T13:18:50.547Z"
 }

Parameter.description: name of the school. Part of the name would match the records
address of the school. Part of the address would match the records
full text search string. Full text search is done to match both name and address
